name: Hive Alive!
description:
THE GAME
You're a happy little bee trying to bring nectar back to your hive but the world is full of enemies that attack you and your hive. Can you keep your hive alive?
https://snufkinshat.itch.io/hivealive

HOW TO PLAY
Pick up nectar from 5 flowers to bring to your hive while avoiding the flying insects.
Once your hive is strong enough, send a swarm to destroy ground-dwelling  beetles (using the Space )
Adjust enemy max speed by using the rabbit and turtle buttons.

DEV NOTES
Coding: Unity Art: Windsor Newton Cottman watercolors, hotpress paper, GIMP, Inkscape, pen, pencil
Music & SFX: Audacity, Wolfram Tones AI Music Generator
